long_description: Protect yourself and your gear from the sharp points of your crampons with this durable Petzl Fakir crampon bag. Zippered clamshell design has an internal hook-and-loop closure strap to keep the crampons from shifting. Durable, polyurethane-coated-nylon base shields the points; upper mesh portion allows crampons to dry during transit. Ideal for other sharp objects such as ice screws; Petzl Fakir crampon bag measures 10.5 x 5.5 x 3.5 in.
short_description: Protect yourself and your gear from the sharp points of your crampons with this durable Petzl Fakir crampon bag.
